body:
As some of the Users here call them selfs beginners and talk about things i never heard of, please keep in mind, that i probably wouldnt even qualify as an beginner. 

I installed Blitz++ with Spack and no errors were thrown. Now i would like to use this package. The thing is, `g++` doesnt pick up blitz on my System. Do i have to link it somehow? Do i have to address the library in my compiler-call? `#include <blitz/array.h>` is not recognized.
title: [Beginner][Absolute Beginner] How do i use a C++-Library that was added through Spack?
